titleStmt.title: The conuerts happines· A comfortable sermon preached at S. Maries Spittle in London, in Easter-weeke, the 19. April. 1609. By Thomas Iackson, Bachelour of Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods word, at Wye in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Thomas, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet for Clement Knight, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the holy Lambe,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The conuerts happinesse.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the holy Lambe
